summary: Completed comprehensive testing of E-Commerce application. Backend APIs are fully functional with all 21 tests passing. Frontend core functionality works well, but critical guest cart merge feature is broken.

ui_bugs.issue: Navigation links in mobile hamburger menu are not clickable

integration_issues.issue: Guest cart items are lost after user registration/login - critical feature not working

passed_tests: All 21 backend API endpoints working correctly
Product listing with search and category filters
Product detail page with quantity selector

success_percentage.frontend: 85% - Core functionality working, critical cart merge issue

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix guest cart merge functionality - guest cart items are completely lost after user registration/login. The syncGuestCart function in CartContext.js is not working properly. Also fix mobile navigation menu link clickability issue.
